meanings.sent1: The windproof jacket kept me warm on a breezy day.
meanings.sent2: I always wear my windproof gloves when it's cold outside.
meanings.sent3: The windproof umbrella refused to flip inside out in the storm.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as windproof as the sturdy oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The windproof material blocked the chilly air completely.

meanings.definition: Designed to prevent wind from passing through.
meanings.sent1: The windproof windows in the house kept out the drafts.
meanings.sent2: The windproof tent stayed secure during the gusty night.
meanings.sent3: The windproof door slammed shut with a satisfying thud.
meanings.sent4: His arguments were as windproof as a fortress wall.
meanings.sent5: The windproof barrier shielded the delicate flowers from the harsh weather.

meanings.sent1: The windproof building stood tall amidst the hurricane.
meanings.sent2: The windproof structure held firm in the face of the storm.
meanings.sent3: The windproof flag fluttered proudly in the powerful gale.
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was as windproof as a lighthouse in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The windproof material endured the fierce winds without tearing.
